mapper.select: select count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
select admin_level_code, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1 and admin_level_code is not null group by admin_level_code

select gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and gender is not null group by gender

select admin_level_code, gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and gender is not null and admin_level_code is not null group by admin_level_code, gender

select nation, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and nation is not null and nation!='' group by nation

select nation, admin_level_code, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and nation is not null and nation!='' and admin_level_code is not null group by nation, admin_level_code

select nation, gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and gender is not null and gender!='' and nation is not null and nation!='' group by nation, gender
select sum(if(dp_type_id>0, 1,0)) as num_1, sum(if(is_ow=1, 1,0)) as num_2 from cadre_view where status=1
select admin_level_code, sum(if(dp_type_id>0, 1,0)) as num_1, sum(if(is_ow=1, 1,0)) as num_2 from cadre_view where status=1 and admin_level_code is not null group by admin_level_code

select gender, sum(if(dp_type_id>0, 1,0)) as num_1, sum(if(is_ow=1, 1,0)) as num_2 from cadre_view where status=1
and gender is not null group by gender

select
sum(if(age<=30, 1,0)) as num_1 ,sum(if(age>=31 and age<=35, num,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(age>=36 and age<=40, num,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(age>=41 and age<=45, num,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(age>=46 and age<=50, num,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(age>=51 and age<=55, num,0)) as num_6 ,sum(if(age>55, num,0)) as num_7
from ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth,now()) as age, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and birth is not null group by age ) tmp

select admin_level_code, sum(if(age<=30, 1,0)) as num_1 ,sum(if(age>=31 and age<=35, num,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(age>=36 and age<=40, num,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(age>=41 and age<=45, num,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(age>=46 and age<=50, num,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(age>=51 and age<=55, num,0)) as num_6 ,sum(if(age>55, num,0)) as num_7
from ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth,now()) as age, admin_level_code, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and birth is not null and admin_level_code is not null group by age,admin_level_code ) tmp group by admin_level_code

select gender,
sum(if(age<=30, 1,0)) as num_1 ,sum(if(age>=31 and age<=35, num,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(age>=36 and age<=40, num,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(age>=41 and age<=45, num,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(age>=46 and age<=50, num,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(age>=51 and age<=55, num,0)) as num_6 ,sum(if(age>55, num,0)) as num_7
from ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth,now()) as age, gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and birth is not null and gender is not null group by age,gender ) tmp group by gender

select sum(if(pro_post_level like '%正高%', 1,0)) as num_1 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%02级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%03级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(04|四)级.*正高', 1,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%副高%', 1,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(中|初)级', 1,0)) as num_6 from cadre_view where status =1

select admin_level_code, sum(if(pro_post_level like '%正高%', 1,0)) as num_1
,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%02级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%03级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(04|四)级.*正高', 1,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%副高%', 1,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(中|初)级', 1,0)) as num_6
from cadre_view where status =1
and admin_level_code is not null group by admin_level_code

select gender, sum(if(pro_post_level like '%正高%', 1,0)) as num_1
,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%02级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_2 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%03级%正高%', 1,0)) as num_3 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(04|四)级.*正高', 1,0)) as num_4 ,sum(if(pro_post_level like '%副高%', 1,0)) as num_5 ,sum(if(pro_post_level REGEXP '(中|初)级', 1,0)) as num_6
from cadre_view where status =1
and gender is not null group by gender

select degree_type, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and degree_type is not null group by degree_type

select degree_type, admin_level_code, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and degree_type is not null and admin_level_code is not null group by degree_type, admin_level_code

select degree_type, gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and degree_type is not null and gender is not null group by degree_type, gender

select edu_id, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and edu_id is not null group by edu_id

select edu_id, admin_level_code, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and edu_id is not null and admin_level_code is not null group by edu_id, admin_level_code

select edu_id, gender, count(*) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and edu_id is not null and gender is not null group by edu_id, gender
select sum(if(is_double, 0,1)) as num from cadre_view where status=1

select admin_level_code ,sum(if(is_double, 0,1)) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and admin_level_code is not null group by admin_level_code

select gender ,sum(if(is_double, 0,1)) as num from cadre_view where status=1
and gender is not null group by gender
select * from cadre_view where status=1

select * from cadre_view where status=1
and nation like '汉%' and nation is not null and nation!=''
and nation not like '汉%' and nation is not null and nation!=''

select * from cadre_view where status=1
and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth,now())>=#{startNum}
and #{endNum}>=TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birth,now())
and birth is not null

select * from cadre_view where status=1
and (is_double =#{isDouble} or is_double is null)
